title: How to Prepare a Pasta Salad from a Salad Kit

steps.headline: Drain the mozzarella and the olives.
Cook the pasta according to directions on the package.
Mix the ingredients from the salad kit, except for the croutons, in a large bowl.
Cut the salami and the mozzarella to tiny pieces.
Add the salami and the cheese to the ingredients in the bowl.
Drain the pasta, and let cool for a while.
Combine it with the ingredients in the bowl.
Put in the fridge until use.

text: Drain the mozzarella and the olives.  Cook the pasta according to directions on the package.  Mix the ingredients from the salad kit, except for the croutons, in a large bowl.  Cut the salami and the mozzarella to tiny pieces.  Add the salami and the cheese to the ingredients in the bowl.  Drain the pasta, and let cool for a while.  Combine it with the ingredients in the bowl.  Garnish with the olives.  Put in the fridge until use.  Finished.
